meanings.definition: Resembling a hen in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The small, round bird had a henlike walk around the farm.
meanings.sent2: The henlike feathers of the bird were soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent3: The henlike behavior of the child pretending to lay eggs made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her henlike clucking when she was excited always brought a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent5: The henlike way she pecked at her food with quick, precise movements was fascinating to watch.
